panels.description: Displays If network is running in safe mode or not.
panels.title: Safe Mode

panels.description: Displays the chain identifier of the SUI Chain.
panels.title: Chain ID

panels.description: Shows the current build version of the SUI Validator.
panels.title: Build Version

panels.description: The protocol version used in this epoch
panels.title: Protocol Version

panels.description: Node stake share
panels.title: Voting Power

panels.description: Current epoch ID for the validator
panels.title: Current Epoch

panels.description: Total duration of the epoch in seconds
panels.title: Epoch Duration

panels.description: Number of checkpoints in the epoch
panels.title: Epoch Checkpoints

panels.description: Number of transactions in the epoch
panels.title: Epoch Transactions

panels.description: Total amount of gas rewards in the epoch (in SUI tokens)
panels.title: Epoch Gas Rewards (SUI)

panels.description: Total time duration when the validator was halted (i.e. epoch closed)
panels.title: Validator Halt Duration

panels.description: Shows the current operational status of the SUI Validator (UP/DOWN).
panels.title: Uptime

panels.description: Displays the uptime trend status of the SUI Validator. Green indicates uptime is increasing, and red indicates it is not.
panels.title: Uptime Over Time

panels.description: Shows validator reputation status. GREEN (HIGH) = good standing (NOT in bottom N low-scoring validators). RED (LOW) = low-scoring status (IN bottom N validators).
panels.title: Reputation Status

panels.description: Shows validator reputation status over time. Green bars (value=1) indicate good standing (NOT in bottom N low-scoring validators). Red bars (value=0) indicate low-scoring status (IN bottom N validators, where N=consensus_handler_num_low_scoring_authorities).
panels.title: Reputation Status Over Time

panels.description: Displays the reputation score of the validator.
panels.title: Reputation Score

panels.description: Shows validator rank based on consensus reputation scores. Lower rank number is better (rank 1 = highest reputation score).
panels.title: Reputation Rank

panels.description: Displays consensus reputation score of the validator over time.
panels.title: Reputation Score Over Time

panels.description: Validator rank over time based on consensus reputation score. Lower rank number is better (rank 1 = highest score). The red threshold line shows the cutoff for low-scoring validators (rank > threshold means in bottom N low-scoring group).
panels.title: Reputation Rank Over Time

panels.description: Last executed checkpoint by node vs network highest synced checkpoint
panels.title: Checkpoint Sync

panels.description: Displays the network's highest synced checkpoint.
panels.title: Highest Synced Checkpoint

panels.description: Round committed by node vs network current round
panels.title: Round Sync

panels.description: The current threshold clock round. We only advance to a new round when a quorum of parents have been synced.
panels.title: Current Round

panels.description: Certificates created by node vs processed by the network
panels.title: Certificate Sync

panels.description: Displays the total number of proposed blocks by the validator.
panels.title: Proposed Blocks

panels.description: Displays the node's highest executed checkpoint.
panels.title: Last Executed Checkpoint

panels.description: The highest round where a block has been accepted. Resets on restart.
panels.title: Highest Accepted Round

panels.description: Displays the total number of committed blocks by the validator.
panels.title: Committed Blocks

panels.description: Last executed checkpoint vs highest synced checkpoint by the node.
panels.title: Checkpoint Sync Over Time

panels.description: Last committed round vs current round by the node.
panels.title: Round Sync Over Time

panels.description: Displays certificates created vs certificates processed by the node.
panels.title: Certificate Sync Over Time
Tx Processing Latency p95 |  Tx Processing Latency p50 |  Proposal Latency |  Consensus Block Commit Rate |  Committed Round Rate |  Fullnode Connectivity

panels.description: Certificates processed by the validator
panels.title: Transactions Per Second

panels.description: Certificates processed by the validator
panels.title: Certificates Per Second

panels.description: Certificates processed by the validator
panels.title: Checkpoints Per Second

panels.description: Clock rounds by the validator
panels.title: Rounds Per Second

panels.description: Displays transactions (objects, certificates and orders) per second processed by the validator.
panels.title: Transactions Per Second

panels.description: Displays consensus block proposals per second, split by forced vs non-forced blocks.
panels.title: Certificates Per Second

panels.description: Displays last executed checkpoint rates over time.
panels.title: Checkpoints Per Second

panels.description: Displays current round and last committed round rates over time.
panels.title: Rounds Rate

panels.description: Displays end-to-end latency of transaction processing through consensus.
panels.title: Consensus Adapter e2e latency

panels.description: Displays consensus proposal latency (quorum receive latency) for the validator.
panels.title: Consensus Proposal Latency

panels.description: Displays p50 and p95 certificate processing latencies for the validator.
panels.title: Cert Processing Latencies

panels.description: The number of connected peers
panels.title: Connected Peers

panels.description: The number of connected peers over time
panels.title: Connected Peers Over Time

panels.description: Total transaction signature errors
panels.title: Transaction Signature Errors (24h)

panels.description: Displays the total count of checkpoint execution errors in the last 24 hours.
panels.title: Checkpoint Execution Errors (24h)

panels.description: Total transaction processing errors from this validator
panels.title: Transaction Processing Errors (24h)

panels.description: Total RPC errors returned from this validator
panels.title: Total RPC Errors (24h)

panels.description: Transaction signature errors over time
panels.title: Transaction Signature Errors Over Time

panels.description: Displays checkpoint execution errors over time.
panels.title: Checkpoint Execution Errors Over Time

panels.description: Transaction Processing Errors Over Time
panels.title: Transaction Processing Errors Over Time

panels.description: RPC errors over time
panels.title: RPC Errors Over Time

panels.description: Last pruned consensus database epoch
panels.title: Last Pruned Epoch

panels.description: Displays the last pruned effects checkpoint number.
panels.title: Last Pruned Checkpoint

panels.description: The number of consensus dbs successfully pruned
panels.title: Pruned DBs

panels.description: Number of pruned objects
panels.title: Pruned Objects

panels.description: Number of epochs to retain for checkpoints
panels.title: Epochs Retained (Checkpoints)

panels.description: Number of epochs to retain for objects
panels.title: Epochs Retained (Objects)

panels.description: Shows the last pruned effects checkpoint over time (24h average)
panels.title: Checkpoint Pruning Over Time

panels.description: Shows the number of pruned objects over time
panels.title: Pruned Objects Over Time

panels.description: Shows the number of successfully pruned consensus databases over time
panels.title: Pruned Consensus DBs Over Time

list.description: SUI Validator name from config.yml. This is used to filter reputation and other validator-specific data.
list.label: Validator Name
list.name: validator_name

list.description: This variable dynamically fetches and displays all available SUI Validator environments (aliases) from the config.yml file based on the configured validators.
list.label: Validator Target
list.name: instance
